sqlMap.select: SELECT iss_cd, iss_name, region_cd FROM giis_issource WHERE active_tag = 'Y' AND cred_br_tag = 'Y' ORDER BY iss_name ASC
SELECT iss_cd, iss_name, region_cd FROM giis_issource WHERE active_tag = 'Y' AND check_user_per_iss_cd2(NULL, iss_cd, #param1#, #param2#) = 1 AND NVL(claim_tag, 'N') != 'Y' ORDER BY iss_name ASC
SELECT iss_cd, iss_name FROM TABLE(giis_issource_pkg.get_issue_source_RI_list) ORDER BY iss_name ASC

SELECT line_cd, main_wc_cd, print_sw, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_title) wc_title, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text01) wc_text01, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text02) wc_text02, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text03) wc_text03, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text04) wc_text04, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text05) wc_text05, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text06) wc_text06, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text07) wc_text07, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text08) wc_text08, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text09) wc_text09, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text10) wc_text10, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text11) wc_text11, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text12) wc_text12, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text13) wc_text13, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text14) wc_text14, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text15) wc_text15, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text16) wc_text16, ESCAPE_VALUE(wc_text17) wc_text17, text_update_sw, wc_sw FROM TABLE(GIIS_WARRCLA_PKG.get_warrcla_list(#lineCd#, NULL))
SELECT * FROM TABLE(GIIS_VESSEL_PKG.get_vessel_list) ORDER BY UPPER(vessel_name)
SELECT c.iss_name, b.grp_iss_cd iss_cd FROM GIIS_USERS a, GIIS_USER_GRP_HDR b, GIIS_ISSOURCE c WHERE a.user_grp = b.user_grp AND b.grp_iss_cd = c.iss_cd AND a.user_id = #value#

SELECT TEXT LINE_NAME, LINE_CD FROM giis_document WHERE title = DECODE(#value#,'fire', 'FIRE_HEADER', 'accident', 'ACCIDENT_HEADER','casualty', 'CASUALTY_HEADER','engineering', 'ENGINEERING_HEADER','marine cargo', 'MARINE_HEADER','marine hull', 'MARINE_HEADER', 'motor car', 'MOTOR_HEADER','aviation', 'AVIATION_HEADER', 'bonds', 'BOND_HEADER', 'personal accident', 'ACCIDENT_HEADER', NULL) AND report_id = 'GIIMM001'
SELECT text LINE_NAME, LINE_CD FROM giis_document WHERE title = 'PACKAGE_HEADER' AND report_id = 'GIIMM001A'
SELECT text LINE_NAME, LINE_CD FROM giis_document WHERE title = 'FOOTER' AND report_id = 'GIIMM001'
select eq_zone, eq_desc from table(Giis_EqZone_Pkg.get_eqzone_list) order by ABS(eq_zone) asc
SELECT * FROM TABLE(Giis_City_Pkg.get_city_by_province_list(#param1#, #param2#)) ORDER BY province_desc, city
SELECT * FROM TABLE(Giis_City_Pkg.get_city_list) ORDER BY province, city
SELECT distinct district_no, district_desc FROM TABLE(Giis_District_Pkg.get_district_list(#param1#, #param2#)) ORDER BY district_no
SELECT * FROM TABLE(Giis_Block_Pkg.get_block_list(#param1#, #param2#, #param3#, #param4#)) ORDER BY district_no, district_desc, block_no, block_desc
SELECT * FROM TABLE(Giis_Block_Pkg.get_all_block_list) ORDER BY district_no, district_desc, block_no, block_desc
SELECT * FROM TABLE(Giis_Tariff_Pkg.get_tariff_list) ORDER BY UPPER(tarf_cd)
SELECT * FROM TABLE(GIIS_OBLIGEE_PKG.get_obligee_list(NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL))
SELECT RTRIM(LTRIM(a.iss_cd)) || '-' ||LTRIM(TO_CHAR(a.prem_seq_no,'099999999999')) invoice FROM gipi_invoice a WHERE policy_id = #policyId#
SELECT RTRIM(LTRIM(a.iss_cd)) || '-' ||LTRIM(TO_CHAR(a.prem_seq_no,'099999999999')) invoice FROM gipi_pack_invoice a WHERE policy_id = #policyId#
SELECT line_cd, line_name FROM TABLE(GIIS_LINE_PKG.GET_LINE_LIST_LOSTBID(#param1#, #param2#)) ORDER BY UPPER(line_name)
SELECT DISTINCT a.line_cd line_cd, b.line_name line_name FROM gicl_advice a, giis_line b WHERE a.line_cd = b.line_cd AND advice_flag = 'Y'

SELECT DISTINCT(advice_year) adv FROM gicl_advice WHERE advice_flag = 'Y' AND iss_cd = DECODE(check_user_per_iss_cd_acctg(NULL,iss_cd,#param1#),1,iss_cd,NULL) AND iss_cd != #param2# AND line_cd = nvl(#param3#, line_cd) ORDER BY adv

SELECT DISTINCT(a.advice_year) adv FROM gicl_advice a, gicl_clm_loss_exp b WHERE a.claim_id = b.claim_id AND a.advice_id = b.advice_id AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT x.gacc_tran_id FROM giac_reversals x, giac_acctrans y WHERE x.reversing_tran_id = y.tran_id AND y.tran_flag != 'D' AND x.gacc_tran_id = b.tran_id) AND a.iss_cd = DECODE(check_user_per_iss_cd_acctg(NULL,a.iss_cd,#param1#),1,a.iss_cd,NULL) AND a.iss_cd != #param2# AND a.line_cd = NVL(#param3#,a.line_cd) ORDER BY adv

SELECT DISTINCT a.line_cd, c.line_name FROM gicl_advice a, gicl_clm_loss_exp b, giis_line c WHERE a.claim_id = b.claim_id AND a.advice_id = b.advice_id AND a.line_cd = c.line_cd AND b.tran_id IS NOT NULL

SELECT * FROM TABLE(GIAC_INW_CLAIM_PAYTS_PKG.get_advice_seq_no_listing(#param1#, #param2#, #param3#, #param4#, #param5#, #param6#))
WHERE advice_seq_no NOT IN $param7$

SELECT MIN (principal_cd) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY principal_name) principal_cd, principal_name, principal_type FROM giis_eng_principal WHERE principal_type = #principalType# GROUP BY principal_name, principal_type ORDER BY UPPER (principal_name)
SELECT iss_cd, iss_name FROM giis_issource order by iss_cd
